Class CustomerStorage

java.lang.Object
CustomerStorage
public class CustomerStorage extends Object
The CustomerStorage class is responsible for handling the storage and retrieval of customer data in the pet adoption system. It provides methods to save, load, and manage customer records using file-based storage.

This class uses serialization to persist customer data to a file and retrieve it when needed.

Key functionalities include:

  • Saving customer data to a file
  • Loading customer data from a file
  • Adding new customers to the storage
  • Retrieving a customer by their unique ID

  • Method Details

    • loadCustomers

      public static List<Customer> loadCustomers()
      Loads the list of customers from the file. If the file does not exist or cannot be read, an empty list is returned.
      Returns:
      a List<Customer> containing all customers loaded from the file

    • saveCustomers

      public static void saveCustomers(List<Customer> customers)
      Saves the list of customers to the file.
      Parameters:
      customers - the List<Customer> to be saved

    • addCustomer

      public static void addCustomer(Customer customer)
      Adds a new customer to the storage. The customer is added to the existing list of customers, and the updated list is saved to the file.
      Parameters:
      customer - the Customer object to be added

    • getCustomerById

      public static Customer getCustomerById(String customerId)
      Retrieves a customer by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the unique ID of the customer to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Customer object with the specified ID, or null if no customer is found
